description: Emergency Medical Relief Initiative for the Public Health Care Facilities (EMRI)

subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.
subproject.description: The objective of the project is to improve health care services and facilities and enhance the capacities of public hospitals in the West Bank, through rehabilitation and construction, equipping and furnishing of 3 selected hospitals in Jenin, Tulkarem, and Qalqelia. In addition to the construction of the facilities, the project will supply medical equipment and ambulances to benefit larger group of the general population.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Emergency Medical Relief-EMRI
